title: MYSYS2
text:
{{||journalHeaderTemplate}} https://www.msys2.org/

AFTER Installation

Update the package database and core system packages with: 
pacman -Syu
If needed, close MSYS2, run it again from Start menu. Update the rest with: 
pacman -Su
caption: {{!!title}} - based on modern Cygwin (POSIX compatibility layer) and MinGW-w64
